Short-term Non-local Study Fund
To encourage PolyU undergraduate students taking up various Short-term Non-local Activities available that 
enhance students’ global outlook and multicultural competency.
Recommended Type of Activities
•

•
Fee-paying short-term programmes listed on Global Classroom or endorsed by GEO/academic units.
•
Programme-related study tours or field trips arranged by academic units.
•
International competition or conference (student participating as audience) that is reputable/influential in the field and is

beneficial to students in terms of personal, academic and professional development. Endorsement from academic unit is 
recommended.
•
Other offshore learning experiences that are credit bearing or formally assessed.
•
Priority would be given to activities in Greater Bay Area (GBA) Mainland cities.

Funding Amount
Asia
HKD 6,000 (5 - 27 days) and HKD 9,000 (28 days up)
Outside Asia
HKD 10,000 (5 - 27 days) and HKD 15,000 (28 days up)
9
- The Fund is limited and may be distributed on first-come, first-served basis.

- Only programme fee, registration fee, travel passage and accommodation may be funded.
- Should the total cost of activity falls below the designated funding amount listed, GEO reserves the right to make a downward adjustment   
of the pre-approved financial support as necessary.

- The Fund does not support internship, service-learning, Global Student Exchange Programmes, subsidy recipients for
Summer@OxBridge or International Competition & Conference Participation Scheme (ICCPS).
